title: Witchblade, Volume 1: Witch Hunt
description: Superstar writer Ron Marz (Ion, The Darkness) begins his ground-breaking run on Witchblade and, along with artist Mike Choi, gives new readers a perfect jumping-on point! Sara Pezzini awakens from a coma and begins anew with a new partner, new precinct, and a new understanding of the Witchblade. Collecting Witchblade issues #80-85.
author: Ron Marz
